snippet: A testament to Pope Francis’ continuing popularity, Il Mio Papa (My Pope) will offer a glossy medley of papal pronouncements and photographs, and peeks into his personal life.
abstract: Forthcoming magazine Il Mio Papa (My Pope) focuses exclusively on life and pronouncements of Pope Francis and is expected to hit Italian newsstands on Ash Wednesday; publication is part fanzine, reflecting continuing public infatuation with Francis, and part conduit for his messages.
lead_paragraph: A testament to Pope Francis’ continuing popularity, Il Mio Papa (My Pope) will offer a glossy medley of papal pronouncements and photographs, and peeks into his personal life.

headline.main: A New Magazine for Fans of the Vatican’s Biggest Star
